title: How to download eBooks from free eBooks - Quora

response.answer_text: First when you open the website, you'll get a dialogue box asking for your email . Just type your email to create your account and get access to 5 ebooks for free in a month. After giving email you'll get a confirmation mail for activation of your account. Finally after verifying you can start downloading ebooks in pdf, epub or Kindle format. Start by searching the book's name.😊 Note: If you do not find verification email in your inbox , please check the spam folder and mark it as ‘not a spam’.
